remarks: Associative-type law for multiplication and division.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpdivf.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpdivf.3 $e |- D = ( /g ` G ) $.
grpomuldivass $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) D C ) = ( A G ( B D C ) ) ) $.
